amendment.description: To ensure that States have policies or procedures that prohibit aiding or abetting of sexual abuse, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2094 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 228.
